title: Sherlock Holmes and Secrets Of Scotland Yard
description: https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr32020/CaseClosed710.mp3  This week on Case Closed, we begin with The Limping Ghost from The New Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes. That story first aired September 3, 1945. (29:09) Our last story comes from The Secrets Of Scotland Yard. We hear their episode from November 16, 1953, titled, The Special Branch. content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, we begin with The Limping Ghost from The New Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes. That story first aired September 3, 1945.

(29:09) Our last story comes from The Secrets Of Scotland Yard. We hear their episode from November 16, 1953, titled, The Special Branch.
